name: Captain Phasma
subtitle: Elite Trooper
text: Your non-unique characters have the Guardian keyword.
flavor: "Whatever you're planning, it won't work."
label: Captain Phasma - Elite Trooper

name: First Order Stormtrooper
flavor: Members of this new generation of stormtroopers are trained from birth and fed a steady diet of First Order propaganda to ensure absolute loyalty.
label: First Order Stormtrooper

name: General Grievous
subtitle: Jedi Hunter
text: Before an opponent's character is defeated, you may move one of their non-ability upgrades to this character.
label: General Grievous - Jedi Hunter

name: General Veers
subtitle: Field Commander
text: Action - Remove this die to turn one of your support dice to any side.
flavor: "General, prepare your troops for a surface attack." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: General Veers - Field Commander

name: AT-ST
text: [special] - Discard a support from play.
flavor: The All Terrain Scout Transport filled both support and reconnaissance roles in the Galactic Empire's war machine.
label: AT-ST

name: First Order TIE Fighter
text: [special] - Remove all shield from all of an opponent's characters.
label: First Order TIE Fighter

name: Commanding Presence
text:
Red character only.
[special] - Choose a Red die. If it is your die, resolve it, increasing its value by 2. If it is an opponent's die, remove it.
label: Commanding Presence

name: F-11D Rifle
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributing the damage as they wish.
label: F-11D Rifle

name: Count Dooku
subtitle: Devious Strategist
text: Before this character is dealt 1 or more damage, you may discard a card from your hand to give him 1 shield.
label: Count Dooku - Devious Strategist

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Sith Lord
text: After you activate this character you may force an opponent to choose and discard a card from their hand.
flavor: "If you will not fight, then you will meet your destiny."
label: Darth Vader - Sith Lord

name: Kylo Ren
subtitle: Vader's Disciple
text: [special] - Choose an opponent's character. Then look at a random card in that opponent's hand and deal damage to that character equal to the cost of the card you just looked at.
label: Kylo Ren - Vader's Disciple

name: Nightsister
text: Action - Reroll a die. Deal 1 damage to this character.
flavor: Nightsisters are skilled at twisting the Force to serve their own ends.
label: Nightsister

name: Force Choke
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage to another character. Then you may turn one of its character or upgrade dice to any side.
label: Force Choke

name: Immobilize
text: Blue Character only. Action - Remove this die to turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Immobilize

name: Kylo Ren's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 2 damage to a character. If any of this damage is blocked by shields, reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Kylo Ren's Lightsaber

name: Sith Holocron
text: [special] - Switch this upgrade with a Blue ability upgrade in your hand, ignoring its play restrictions. Then you may spend 1 resource to roll its die into your pool, if able.
label: Sith Holocron

name: Infantry Grenades
text: [special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.
label: Infantry Grenades

name: Speeder Bike Scout
text: [special] - Remove a die. You may take one additional action.
label: Speeder Bike Scout

name: Bala-Tik
subtitle: Gang Leader
text: After an opponent's character is defeated, you may ready this character.
label: Bala-Tik - Gang Leader

name: Jabba the Hutt
subtitle: The Great and Mighty
text: After you activate this character, you may reroll a Yellow die.
flavor: "I shall enjoy watching you die."
label: Jabba the Hutt - The Great and Mighty

name: Jango Fett
subtitle: Lethal Mercenary
text: After an opponent activates a character, you may activate this character.
flavor: "There can be no mistakes this time."
label: Jango Fett - Lethal Mercenary

name: Tusken Raider
text: After you activate this character, you may discard a card from your hand to resolve one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: Tusken Raider

name: Crime Lord
text:
Yellow Character only.
[special] - Spend 5 resources to choose a character. That character is defeated after this round ends.
label: Crime Lord

name: Flame Thrower
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage each to up to 3 different characters.
label: Flame Thrower

name: Gaffi Stick
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Remove one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to deal 3 damage to a character.
label: Gaffi Stick

name: On The Hunt
text: [special] - Remove all shields from a character. You may spend 1 resource to remove one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: On The Hunt

name: Admiral Ackbar
subtitle: Perceptive Tactician
text: After an opponent plays or discards the last card from their hand, they choose and deal 2 damage to one of their characters.
label: Admiral Ackbar - Perceptive Tactician

name: Leia Organa
subtitle: Born Leader
text: Action - Remove this die to reroll up to 2 of your dice.
flavor: "Someone has to save our skins."
label: Leia Organa - Born Leader

name: Poe Dameron
subtitle: Ace Pilot
text: [special] - Discard a card from your hand to resolve one of the sides of its die, if able. Then, if it was a vehicle card, you may pay its cost to play it from your discard pile.
label: Poe Dameron - Ace Pilot

name: Rebel Trooper
text: Guardian.
label: Rebel Trooper

name: Launch Bay
text: The X on this die is equal to the number of cards in your hand.
label: Launch Bay

name: Black One
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. Reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
flavor: Poe Dameron's X-Wing was modified to be even more versatile than the standard T-70
label: Black One

name: Scout
text: [special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard the cheapest card from it (you choose in the case of a tie).
label: Scout

name: Survival Gear
flavor: To hide from the Empire, the rebels must often brave harsh environments.
label: Survival Gear

name: Luke Skywalker
subtitle: Jedi Knight
text: After you activate this character, draw a card.
flavor: "I am a Jedi, like my father before me."
label: Luke Skywalker - Jedi Knight

name: Padawan
text: While this character does not have an upgrade, the cost to attach a weapon to it is decreased by 1.
label: Padawan

name: Qui-Gon Jinn
subtitle: Ataru Master
text: Before this character gains 1 or more shields, you may remove 1 of his shields to deal 1 damage to a character.
flavor: "Your focus determines your reality."
label: Qui-Gon Jinn - Ataru Master

name: Rey
subtitle: Force Prodigy
text: After you play an upgrade on this character, you may take one additional action.
flavor: "I think I can handle myself."
label: Rey - Force Prodigy

name: Force Protection
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.
label: Force Protection

name: Jedi Robes
text: After you play this upgrade, give attached character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead in the first round of play.
label: Jedi Robes

name: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Give a character 2 shields or deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Luke Skywalker's Lightsaber

name: One With The Force
text:
Blue character only.
Before attached character is defeated, this upgrade becomes a support for the rest of the game (it starts ready).
label: One With The Force

name: BB-8
text: [special] - Reroll this die and one of your other dice.  Do not remove this die from your pool after resolving this ability.
flavor: "Orange and white: one of a kind." <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
label: BB-8

name: Rey's Staff
text: [special] - Remove a die showing damage ([melee] or [ranged])
label: Rey's Staff

name: Finn
subtitle: First Order Defector
text: You can attach any weapon to this character, ignoring play restrictions. You can include Red Villain weapons and vehicles in your deck.
flavor: "I'm not going back."
label: Finn - First Order Defector

name: Han Solo
subtitle: Scoundrel
text: After you play a card with the Ambush keyword, you may give this character 1 shield.
flavor: "You know, sometimes I amaze even myself."
label: Han Solo - Scoundrel

name: Hired Gun
flavor: "You needn't worry about your reward. If money is all that you love, then that's what you'll receive." <cite>Leia Organa</cite>
label: Hired Gun

name: Padme Amidala
subtitle: Queen of Naboo
text: [special] - Discard the top card of an opponent's deck or spend 1 resource to discard the top 2 cards of an opponent's deck.
flavor: "My fate will be no different to that of our people."
label: Padme Amidala - Queen of Naboo

name: Millennium Falcon
text: [special] - Play a Yellow event from your discard pile or hand for free.
flavor: "She may not look like much, but she's got it where it counts." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Millennium Falcon

name: Diplomatic Immunity
text: The shields from this die can be given to any of your characters distributed as you wish.
label: Diplomatic Immunity

name: DL-44 Heavy Blaster Pistol
text:
Ambush.
After you play this upgrade, force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice.
label: DL-44 Heavy Blaster Pistol

name: Infiltrate
text: [special] - Reroll up to 2 of an opponent's dice.
label: Infiltrate

name: Outpost
text: [special] - Resolve the battlefield ability as if you had just claimed it.
label: Outpost

name: DH-17 Blaster Pistol
flavor: The weapon of choice for rebel soldiers and imperial officers alike during the Galactic Civil War.
label: DH-17 Blaster Pistol

name: IQA-11 Blaster Rifle
text: [special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: IQA-11 Blaster Rifle

name: Promotion
text:
Red character only.
After you play this upgrade, you may draw a card.
label: Promotion

name: Force Throw
text:
Blue Character Only.
[special] - Remove a die to deal a character damage equal to the value showing on that die (specials and blanks are zeroes).
label: Force Throw

name: Force Training
text:
To play, spot a Blue character.
[special] - Choose and do two of the following: deal 1 damage to a character, or gain 1 resource, or give a character 1 shield.
label: Force Training

name: Lightsaber
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Lightsaber

name: Mind Probe
text:
Blue Character only.
[special] - Deal an opponent's character 1 damage for each card in that opponent's hand.
label: Mind Probe

name: Comlink
text: After you play this upgrade, you may reroll any number of your dice or any number of an opponent's dice.
label: Comlink

name: Datapad
text: [special] - Turn one of your dice to a side not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Datapad

name: Holdout Blaster
text: Ambush. Redeploy.
label: Holdout Blaster

name: Black Market
text: [special] - Draw 2 cards. You may play an upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Black Market

name: Cunning
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Resolve a special ability ([special]) on another card in play as if it were your card.
label: Cunning

name: Jetpack
text: [special] - Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]) and give attached character 1 shield.
label: Jetpack

name: Thermal Detonator
text:
To play, spot a Yellow character.
[special] - Deal 3 damage to each of an opponent's characters. Discard this upgrade from play.
label: Thermal Detonator

name: Cannon Fodder
text: Deal one of your non-unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage ([melee] or [ranged]). Then remove that die.
label: Cannon Fodder

name: Closing the Net
text: Force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice. You may place this event on the bottom of your deck instead of discarding it.
label: Closing the Net

name: Endless Ranks
text: Return one of your defeated non-unique Red characters to the game with no damage on it.
flavor: Battle droids are less effective than flesh and blood soldiers, but they are also much cheaper to replace.
label: Endless Ranks

name: Occupation
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Force an opponent to lose all of their resources.
label: Occupation

name: Probe
text: Look at two random cards from your opponent's hand and discard any of these cards that are events.
label: Probe

name: Sweep the Area
text: Count the number of ready Red characters you have. Reroll that many of an opponent's dice.
label: Sweep the Area

name: Tactical Mastery
text: Spot a Red character to take up to 2 additional actions.
label: Tactical Mastery

name: The Best Defense...
text: Deal one of your Red characters 3 damage to remove up to 2 of an opponent's dice.
flavor: "There they are! Blast them!"
label: The Best Defense...

name: Drudge Work
text: Action - Exhaust this support and one of your characters to gain 1 resource.
label: Drudge Work

name: Local Garrison
text: Each opponent gains 1 fewer resource during each upkeep phase to a minimum of 1.
label: Local Garrison

name: Personal Escort
text: Attached character has the Guardian keyword.
label: Personal Escort

name: Abandon All Hope
text: Force an opponent to choose to either lose all of their resources or discard all cards in their hand.
label: Abandon All Hope

name: Boundless Ambition
text: Draw cards up to your hand size.
label: Boundless Ambition

name: Enrage
text: Deal 1 damage to one of your Blue characters to gain 1 resource.
label: Enrage

name: Feel Your Anger
text: Count the number of blanks ([blank]) showing on an opponent's dice. Remove that many of their dice.
flavor: "Let the hate flow through you." <cite>Emperor Palpatine</cite>
label: Feel Your Anger

name: Force Strike
text: Turn one of your Blue dice to the side showing melee damage ([melee]). Then you may resolve that die.
label: Force Strike

name: Intimidate
text: Remove all shields from a character.
label: Intimidate

name: Isolation
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a character die.
label: Isolation

name: No Mercy
text: Discard any number of Blue cards from your hand. Then resolve one of your dice showing damage ([melee] or [ranged]), increasing its value by 1 for each card you just discarded.
label: No Mercy

name: Pulling the Strings
text: Look at the top 3 cards of any deck. Then place those cards on the top and/or bottom of that deck in any order.
label: Pulling the Strings

name: Emperor's Favor
text: Your hand size is increased by 1.
label: Emperor's Favor

name: Power of the Dark Side
text: Action - Exaust this support to reroll one of your dice. If that die rolls a blank ([blank]), deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
flavor: "If you only knew the power of the dark side." <cite>Darth Vader</cite>
label: Power of the Dark Side

name: Hidden In Shadow
text: Action - If attached character has no shields, exhaust this upgrade to give it 1 shield.
label: Hidden In Shadow

name: Nowhere to Run
text: Turn each of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to any side.
label: Nowhere to Run

name: Ace in the Hole
text: Discard a Yellow upgrade from your hand to roll its die into your pool, if able. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.
label: Ace in the Hole

name: Armed to the Teeth
text: Discard any number of upgrades from one of your Yellow characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of upgrades you just discarded.
label: Armed to the Teeth

name: Confiscation
text: Spend resources equal to the cost of an opponent's upgrade in play to return that upgrade to their hand.
label: Confiscation

name: Fight Dirty
text: Remove any number of your Yellow dice. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Fight Dirty

name: Go for the Kill
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), treating this damage as unblockable.
label: Go for the Kill

name: He Doesn't Like You
text: Remove one of your dice to remove an opponent's die.
flavor: "I don't like you, either."
label: He Doesn't Like You

name: Lying in Wait
text: Force an opponent to choose and discard cards from their hand down to the number of cards you have in your hand.
label: Lying in Wait

name: Backup Muscle
text: When you play this support, place 3 damage on it. Action - Exhaust this support to move 1 damage from it to a character (this ignores shields).
label: Backup Muscle

name: My Kind of Scum
text: After you resolve a die showing disrupt ([disrupt]), you may exhaust this support to gain resources equal to the number of resources your opponent just lost.
label: My Kind of Scum

name: Underworld Connections
text: Action - Exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.
label: Underworld Connections

name: Prized Possession
text: After you play this upgrade, you may remove an opponent's character die and place it here. It is not rolled by any character and does not return to its character unless this upgrade leaves play.
label: Prized Possession

name: Commando Raid
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing discard ([discard]), increasing its value by 2. Then draw a card.
label: Commando Raid

name: Defensive Position
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove all of an opponent's dice showing a value of 2 or higher.
label: Defensive Position

name: Field Medic
text: Remove 2 damage from a character.
label: Field Medic

name: Hit and Run
text:
Ambush.
Activate one of your Red characters.
label: Hit and Run

name: It's a Trap!
text:
Ambush.
Choose a symbol showing on an opponent's die. Then turn any number of your Red dice to sides showing that symbol.
label: It's a Trap!

name: Natural Talent
text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.
label: Natural Talent

name: Rearm
text: Play a Red upgrade from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Rearm

name: Retreat
text: Your opponent may take 1 action. Then end the action phase.
label: Retreat

name: Strategic Planning
text: Ready or exhaust a support.
label: Strategic Planning

name: Surgical Strike
text: Remove any number of your Red dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increasing each of their values by 1, to discard a support from play that costs equal to or less than the combined value of those dice.
label: Surgical Strike

name: Resistance HQ
text: Action - Exhaust this support and discard a card from your hand to give a character 1 shield. Then ready this support unless an opponent spends 1 resource.
label: Resistance HQ

name: Anticipate
text: Force an opponent to choose and resolve any number of their dice in the order of their choice. Then remove all of their dice they did not resolve.
label: Anticipate

name: Defensive Stance
text: Give a character 2 shields.
label: Defensive Stance

name: Force Misdirection
text: Choose a symbol showing on one of your Blue dice. Then remove all of an opponent's dice showing that symbol.
label: Force Misdirection

name: Heroism
text: Deal one of your unique characters damage equal to the value of an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Then remove that die.
label: Heroism

name: Noble Sacrifice
text: Defeat one of your Blue characters to exhaust a character.
label: Noble Sacrifice

name: Patience
text: Remove any number of your dice. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the number of dice you just removed.
label: Patience

name: Return of the Jedi
text: Add a blue event from your discard pile to your hand.
flavor: "Pass on what you have learned." <cite>Yoda</cite>
label: Return of the Jedi

name: Riposte
text: Remove any number of shields from one of your characters. Then deal damage to a character equal to the number of shields you just removed.
label: Riposte

name: Willpower
text: Move 1 damage from one of your exhausted characters to an opponent's exhausted character (this ignores shields).
label: Willpower

name: Jedi Council
text: Action - Exhaust this support to look at the top 2 cards of a player's deck. Then you may discard one of those cards and have that player draw the other.
label: Jedi Council

name: Awakening
text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing a modified side (a side with a +) as if it was not modified (did not have the +).
label: Awakening

name: The Force is Strong
text: Action - Exhaust this support and discard a Blue card from your hand to play another copy of that card from your hand for free.
label: The Force is Strong

name: Daring Escape
text:
Ambush.
Reroll any number of an opponent's dice. Then remove all of ther dice showing blanks ([blank]).
label: Daring Escape

name: Don't Get Cocky
text: Each player draws 2 cards.
flavor: "I got one! I got one!" <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: Don't Get Cocky

name: Draw Attention
text: Move up to 2 damage from one of your characters to another one of your characters (this ignores shields).
label: Draw Attention

name: Hyperspace Jump
text: End the action phase. You may switch the battlefield with the battlefield that is not being used. Set aside this card instead of discarding it.
label: Hyperspace Jump

name: Let The Wookiee Win
text: Force an opponent to choose to either deal one of their exausted characters 2 damage or choose and remove 2 of their dice.
label: Let The Wookiee Win

name: Negotiate
text: Remove one of your character dice to force an opponent to choose and remove 2 of their dice.
label: Negotiate

name: Scavenge
text: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. Then you may add an upgrade or support from your discard pile to your hand.
label: Scavenge

name: Shoot First
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your Yellow dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Then remove an opponent's die showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Shoot First

name: Smuggling
text: Spot a Yellow character and discard a card from your hand to gain 1 resource.
label: Smuggling

name: Play the Odds
text: Action - Exhaust this support to reroll one of your Yellow dice. If it rolls a resource ([resource]), gain 1 resource.
label: Play the Odds

name: Street Informants
text: Ambush. Action - Exhaust this support to look at an opponent's hand.
label: Street Informants

name: Second Chance
text:
Yellow character only.
Before attached character would be defeated, instead heal 5 damage from it and discard this upgrade from play.
label: Second Chance

name: Award Ceremony
text: Spot a Red character to draw cards equal to the number of exhausted characters you have.
label: Award Ceremony

name: Dug in
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Give 3 shields to your characters, distributed as you wish.
label: Dug in

name: Firepower
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increasing its value by 1, or by 2 instead if you are resolving a vehicle die.
label: Firepower

name: Leadership
text: Exhaust one of your unique Red characters to ready another character.
label: Leadership

name: Logistics
text: Spot a red character to resolve a die with the resource symbol ([resource]), increasing its value by 1.
label: Logistics

name: Squad Tactics
text: Activate any number of your non-unique characters at once.
label: Squad Tactics

name: Supporting Fire
text: Action - Exhaust this support to resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]), increasing its value by 1.
label: Supporting Fire

name: Deflect
text: Spot a Blue character to remove a die showing ranged damage ([ranged]) and deal half of that damage, rounded up, to a character.
label: Deflect

name: Disturbance in the Force
text: Reroll all dice.
flavor: "I fear something terrible has happened, as if millions of voices suddenly cried out and were silenced." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi</cite>
label: Disturbance in the Force

name: Mind Trick
text: Spot a Blue character to force your opponent to split their dice pool into 2 groups of any size. Choose 1 group and remove all dice in it.
label: Mind Trick

name: The Power of the Force
text: Resolve one of your dice, treating its value as equal to the number of Blue upgrades you have in play.
label: The Power of the Force

name: Use The Force
text: Spot a Blue character to turn a die to any side.
flavor: "The Force will be with you, always." <cite>Obi-Wan Kenobi
label: Use The Force

name: It Binds All Things
text: Before you play a Blue upgrade, you may exhaust this support to decrease its cost by 1.
label: It Binds All Things

name: Aim
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Aim

name: All In
text: Resolve any number of your dice in the order of your choice.
label: All In

name: Block
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing melee damage.
label: Block

name: Close Quarters Assault
text: Count the number of dice you have showing melee damage ([melee]). Discard that many random cards from an opponent's hand.
label: Close Quarters Assault

name: Dodge
text: Remove all of an opponent's dice showing ranged damage ([ranged])
label: Dodge

name: Flank
text:
Play only if you have more ready characters than an opponent.
Remove one of that opponent's dice.
label: Flank

name: Take Cover
text: Give a character 1 shield.
label: Take Cover

name: Disarm
text: Remove one of your dice showing damage ([melee] or [ranged]) to discard a weapon or equipment from play that costs equal to or less than the value of that die.
label: Disarm

name: Electroshock
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing a value of 2 or lower.
label: Electroshock

name: Reversal
text: Spot a Yellow character to remove a die showing damage ([melee] or [ranged]) and deal that damage to a character.
label: Reversal

name: Scramble
text: Spot a Yellow character to reroll all of an opponent's dice.
label: Scramble

name: Unpredictable
text:
Ambush.
Reroll a die (yours or an opponent's).
label: Unpredictable

name: Infamous
text: Before you play a Yellow card, you may exhaust this support to give it the Ambush keyword.
label: Infamous

name: Hunker Down
text: If attached character takes melee damage ([melee]), discard this upgrade. Action - Exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.
label: Hunker Down

name: Command Center
subtitle: Lothal
text: Claim - Each opponent discards the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Command Center - Lothal

name: Echo Base
subtitle: Hoth
text: Claim - Give a character 1 shield.
label: Echo Base - Hoth

name: Emperor's Throne Room
subtitle: Death Star II
text: Claim - Turn one of your dice to a side showing a special ability ([special]). Then you may resolve that die.
label: Emperor's Throne Room - Death Star II

name: Frozen Wastes
subtitle: Starkiller Base
text: Claim - Remove one character die.
label: Frozen Wastes - Starkiller Base

name: Imperial Armory
subtitle: Death Star
text: Claim - Play an upgrade from your hand, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Imperial Armory - Death Star

name: Jedi Temple
subtitle: Coruscant
text: Claim - Look at an opponent's hand and discard up to 2 events of your choice from it.
label: Jedi Temple - Coruscant

name: Rebel War Room
subtitle: Yavin IV
text: Claim - Resolve one of your dice. If it has a resource cost, you do not have to pay it.
label: Rebel War Room - Yavin IV

name: Mos Eisley Spaceport
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Return one of your upgrades in play to your hand to gain 1 resource.
label: Mos Eisley Spaceport - Tatooine

name: Separatist Base
subtitle: Mustafar
text: Claim - Each opponent chooses and deals 1 unblockable damage to one of their characters.
label: Separatist Base - Mustafar

name: Starship Graveyard
subtitle: Jakku
text: Claim - Choose a support or upgrade in your discard pile and place it on top of your deck.
label: Starship Graveyard - Jakku

name: Death Trooper
flavor: Krennic's personal guard, they defend their commander with extreme prejudice.
label: Death Trooper

name: FN-2199
subtitle: Loyal Trooper
text: After you play a weapon on this character, roll that weapon die, if able. You may immediately resolve it.
flavor: "Traitor!"
label: FN-2199 - Loyal Trooper

name: Director Krennic
subtitle: Cruel but Brilliant
text: After you activate this character, if you control the battlefield, roll a Death Trooper ([SoR]1) die into your pool. Set aside that die after it is resolved or removed.
label: Director Krennic - Cruel but Brilliant

name: Tie Pilot
text: While this die is in your pool, your other dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) cannot be removed by an opponent.
flavor: "I can't shake him!" <cite>Biggs Darklighter</cite>
label: Tie Pilot

name: E-Web Emplacement
text: While you control the battlefield, the value of each of this die's sides is increased by 1.
label: E-Web Emplacement

name: Imperial Discipline
text: Red character only. Action - Remove this die to turn one of this character's character or upgrade dice to a side showing ranged damage ([ranged]) or a resource ([resource]).
label: Imperial Discipline

name: DT-29 Heavy Blaster Pistol
text: [special] - Remove an opponent's die showing a resource cost.
label: DT-29 Heavy Blaster Pistol

name: Z6 Riot Control Baton
text:
Redeploy.
After you roll this die into your pool, you may reroll it.
label: Z6 Riot Control Baton

name: Asajj Ventress
subtitle: Force Assassin
text: After an opponent discards a card from their hand to reroll dice, you may force them to choose and discard another card from their hand.
flavor: "Your weakness will not be my downfall!"
label: Asajj Ventress - Force Assassin

name: Darth Vader
subtitle: Dark Apprentice
text: [special] - Deal 3 damage to a character. Then deal 1 damage to this character.
flavor: "You understimate my power."
label: Darth Vader - Dark Apprentice

name: Palpatine
subtitle: Galactic Emperor
text: After you resolve this die, force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributed as they wish.
flavor: "Everything is proceeding as I have foreseen."
label: Palpatine - Galactic Emperor

name: Royal Guard
text: Guardian. You cannot play Blue abilities on this character.
label: Royal Guard

name: Command Shuttle
text: [special] - Use a special ability ([special]) on one of your characters.
label: Command Shuttle

name: Force Lightning
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character. You  may remove a die showing a blank ([blank]) to reroll this die instead of removing it from your pool.
label: Force Lightning

name: Lightsaber Pike
text: Action - Remove this die to give a non-attached character 1 shield.
label: Lightsaber Pike

name: Lure of Power
text: You may resolve the modifier sides (sides with a +) of this die to modify any symbol.
label: Lure of Power

name: Interrogation Droid
text: After you activate this support, look at a random card in an opponent's hand. If that card is an event, you may remove this die to discard it.
label: Interrogation Droid

name: Aurra Sing
subtitle: Deadly Shot
text: Before you resolve this die, you may discard a card from your hand you increase its value by 1.
flavor: "Well, what do we have here?"
label: Aurra Sing - Deadly Shot

name: Guavian Enforcer
text: Action - Remove this die to remove 1 shield from a character.
label: Guavian Enforcer

name: IG-88
subtitle: Assassin Droid
text: [special] - Play a Yellow weapon or equipment from your discard pile on this character, decreasing its cost by 2.
label: IG-88 - Assassin Droid

name: Unkar Plutt
subtitle: Junk Dealer
text: Action - Remove any number of your dice showing a combined value of 3 or more. Then discard a random card from an opponent's hand and gain resources equal to its cost.
label: Unkar Plutt - Junk Dealer

name: Slave I
text: [special] - Force an opponent to deal damage to their characters equal to the number of dice in their dice pool, distributed as they wish.
label: Slave I

name: Blackmail
text: After you roll this die, any opponent may give you 1 resource to remove this die.
label: Blackmail

name: Personal Shield
text: Before attached character is dealt 2 or more ranged damage ([ranged]), you may exhaust this upgrade to give attached character 1 shield.
label: Personal Shield

name: Vibroknucklers
text:
Ambush.
Before resolving this die, you  may spend 1 resource to increase its value by 1.
label: Vibroknucklers

name: Baze Malbus
subtitle: Crack Shot
text: [special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Baze Malbus - Crack Shot

name: Mon Mothma
subtitle: Skilled Politician
text: After you play an event, you may reroll a die of the same color as that event.
label: Mon Mothma - Skilled Politician

name: Rebel Commando
text: [special] - Remove an opponent's die.
label: Rebel Commando

name: Temmin "Snap" Wexley
subtitle: Recon Specialist
text: While at least one of this die is in your pool, your opponent must spend 1 resource in order to claim the battlefield.
flavor: "Watch out for ground fire!"
label: Temmin "Snap" Wexley - Recon Specialist

name: C-3PO
text: Action - Remove this die to resolve one of your dice as if it were showing a different symbol (it keeps its original value).
flavor: "It is I, See-Threepio!"
label: C-3PO

name: U-Wing
text:
[special] - Deal 2 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
[special] - Give each of your characters 2 shields.
label: U-Wing

name: A180 Blaster
text:
[special] - Deal 1 damage to a character and give attached character 1 shield.
[special] - Deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
[special] - Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: A180 Blaster

name: Overkill
flavor: The most hardened soldiers already know they're dead.
label: Overkill

name: Jedi Acolyte
text: Before you resolve this die, increase its value by 1, if it is showing the same symbol as one of your other dice.
label: Jedi Acolyte

name: Chirrut Îmwe
subtitle: Blind Warrior
text: You cannot play Blue abilities on this character. After you activate this character, you may reroll all of your dice showing blanks ([blank]).
label: Chirrut Îmwe - Blind Warrior

name: Luminara Unduli
subtitle: Inspiring Commander
text: [special] - Resolve one of your character dice, increasing its value by 2, or by 3 instead if it is a non-unique character die.
flavor: "Synchronize on my mark."
label: Luminara Unduli - Inspiring Commander

name: Obi-Wan Kenobi
subtitle: Mysterious Hermit
text:
Guardian.
Before this character is defeated, you may play a Blue card from your hand or discard pile for free.
flavor: "Stretch out with your feelings."
label: Obi-Wan Kenobi - Mysterious Hermit

name: Delta-7 Interceptor
text: [special] - Reroll up to 3 dices (yours and/or your opponent's).
flavor: A favorite of the Jedi during the Clone Wars.
label: Delta-7 Interceptor

name: Handcrafted Light Bow
text:
[special] - Deal 3 damage to a character.
[special] - Remove all shields from a character. Then deal 2 damage to that character.
label: Handcrafted Light Bow

name: Force Heal
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Heal 1 damage from a character or spend 1 resource to heal 2 damage from a character.
label: Force Heal

name: Journals of Ben Kenobi
text: Action - Remove this die to draw a card.
label: Journals of Ben Kenobi

name: R2-D2
text: [special] - Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by 1.
flavor: "That little droid and I have been through a lot together." <cite>Luke Skywalker</cite>
label: R2-D2

name: Chewbacca
subtitle: Loyal Friend
text: [special] - Turn a opponent's die to a side showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) to deal that damage to a character.
flavor: Rroooaarrgghh!
label: Chewbacca - Loyal Friend

name: Jyn Erso
subtitle: Reckless Operative
text: The cost of the first Yellow event you play each round is decreased by 1.
label: Jyn Erso - Reckless Operative

name: Maz Kanata
subtitle: Pirate Queen
text: After you activate this character, you may resolve up to 2 of your dice.
flavor: If you live long enough, you see the same eyes in different people.
label: Maz Kanata - Pirate Queen

name: Outer Rim Smuggler
text: The first time each round you play the last card from your hand, gain 1 resource.
label: Outer Rim Smuggler

name: Smuggling Freighter
text: After you resolve one of this die's sides showing a value of 2, place this support on the top of your deck.
label: Smuggling Freighter

name: Bowcaster
text:
Redeploy.
[special] - Deal 1 unblockable damage each to up to 2 different characters.
flavor: "I like this thing." <cite>Han Solo</cite>
label: Bowcaster

name: Lone Operative
text: [special] - Heal 2 damage from attached character, or 3 damage instead if attached characer is your only character in play.
label: Lone Operative

name: Maz's Goggles
text:
To play, spot a Yellow character.
[special] - Look at an opponent's hand and discard an event from it.
label: Maz's Goggles

name: Supply Line
text: [special] - Reroll any number of your dice.
label: Supply Line

name: Astromech
text: Action - Remove this die to turn a vehicle die to any side.
label: Astromech

name: Rocket Launcher
text: [special] - Discard a vehicle from play. [special] - Deal 2 damage each to up to 2 different characters.
label: Rocket Launcher

name: Force Push
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Turn up to 2 of an opponent's dice to sides of your choice.
label: Force Push

name: Force Speed
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Take up to 2 additional actions.
label: Force Speed

name: Makashi Training
text: To play, spot a Blue character. Action - Remove one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]) and exhaust this upgrade to remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Makashi Training

name: Vibroknife
text: Ambush. While this die is in your pool, melee damage ([melee]) dealt by your dice (including this die) is unblockable.
label: Vibroknife

name: Quadjumper
text: Action - Discard this support to play a support from your hand, decreasing its cost by 3.
label: Quadjumper

name: Ascension Gun
text: [special] - Use the ability on a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game) as if you had just claimed it.
label: Ascension Gun

name: Con Artist
text:
Yellow character only.
[special] - Place 1 damage on this upgrade. Then discard cards from the top of an opponent's deck equal to the amount of damage on this upgrade.
label: Con Artist

name: Battle Formation
text:
Ambush.
Count the number of Red characters you have. You may reroll that many of your dice.
label: Battle Formation

name: Imperial War Machine
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing a resource cost for free.
label: Imperial War Machine

name: Lockdown
text: Ambush. Spot two Red characters to take control of the battlefield. (This does not claim the battlefield.)
label: Lockdown

name: Sustained Fire
text:
Play only if you have 2 or more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
Remove all shields from all of an opponent's characters.
label: Sustained Fire

name: Traitor!
text:
Ambush.
Discard the top card of your deck. Then remove a die not showing a special ([special]) that has a value equal to or less than the cost of the card you just discarded.
label: Traitor!

name: Trench Warfare
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a shield ([shield]).
Turn any number of an opponent's dice to sides showing shields ([shield]).
label: Trench Warfare

name: Undying Loyalty
text: Heal 1 damage from a Red character. If there is another copy of this event in your discard pile, you may spend 1 resource to place this event on the top of your deck instead of discarding it.
label: Undying Loyalty

name: We Have Them Now
text:
Play only if you control de battlefield.
Turn up to 4 of your dice to sides showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: We Have Them Now

name: Attrition
text: After one of your characters is defeated, deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Attrition

name: Imperial Inspection
text: After one of your dice rolls a disrupt ([disrupt]), you may exhaust this support to return an upgrade in play that costs 2 or less to its owner's hand.
label: Imperial Inspection

name: Anger
text:
Play only if you have 2 or more dice showing blanks ([blank]).
Resolve an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) as if it were your die.
label: Anger

name: Lightsaber Throw
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing melee damage ([melee]).
Deal 2 damage to a character.
label: Lightsaber Throw

name: Manipulate
text: Turn one of your dice to a side showing a blank ([blank]). Then turn an opponent's die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Manipulate

name: No Disintegrations
text: Discard the top card of an opponent's deck, or 3 cards instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: No Disintegrations

name: Now You Will Die
text: Resolve one of your dice as if it were showing melee damage ([melee]) (it keeps its original value).
label: Now You Will Die

name: Rise Again
text: Heal 5 damage from a unique Blue character. You may play an upgrade from your discard pile on it for free.
label: Rise Again

name: The Price of Failure
text: Spot a Blue character and defeat one of your characters to ready a character.
label: The Price of Failure

name: Dark Presence
text: After one of your dice rolls a discard ([discard]), you may exhaust this support to force an opponent to choose and remove one of their dice.
label: Dark Presence

name: Now I Am The Master
text: After attached character's character or upgrade dice deal damage, you may exhaust this upgrade to turn a die to a side showing a blank ([blank]).
label: Now I Am The Master

name: Doubt
text: Reroll an opponent's die. Then that opponent either resolves that die or removes it.
label: Doubt

name: Arms Deal
text: Discard any number of weapons from your hand. Then gain 1 resource for each card you just discarded.
label: Arms Deal

name: Bait and Switch
text:
Ambush.
Turn one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]) to any side.
label: Bait and Switch

name: Friends in High Places
text:
Play only if you have dice showing a combined value of 7 or more.
Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may play one of those cards for free. Discard the cards you don't play.
label: Friends in High Places

name: Loose Ends
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to discard the top 4 cards of an opponent's deck.
label: Loose Ends

name: One-Quarter Portion
text: Remove an opponenet's die. Then that opponent gains 1 resource.
label: One-Quarter Portion

name: Relentless Pursuit
text: Move up to 2 damage from an opponent's character to another character (this ignores shields.)
label: Relentless Pursuit

name: Scrap Buy
text: Play only if you have 3 or more cards in your discard pile. Add a random card from your discard pile to your hand (show the card to your opponents).
label: Scrap Buy

name: Salvage Stand
text: After one of your dice rolls a resource ([resource]), you may exhaust this support to force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Salvage Stand

name: Armor Plating
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may block up to 2 damage. Then discard this upgrade from play.
label: Armor Plating

name: Emergency Evacuation
text: Remove all dice.
label: Emergency Evacuation

name: Friendly Fire
text: Spot a Red character and remove an opponent's dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) to deal that damage to a character.
label: Friendly Fire

name: Guerrilla Warfare
text:
Ambush.
Remove one of your Red dice to deal 1 damage to a character.
label: Guerrilla Warfare

name: Our Only Hope
text: Draw a card. You may play that card for free or discard that card to gain 2 resources.
label: Our Only Hope

name: Rebel Assault
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
Remove an opponent's die not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Rebel Assault

name: Sensor Placement
text: Spot a red character to resolve an opponent's die not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]) as if it were your die.
label: Sensor Placement

name: Spirit of Rebellion
text: Give a character 1 shield, or 2 shields instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Spirit of Rebellion

name: Planetary Uprising
text: After you claim the battlefield, force an opponent to deal 2 damage to their characters, distributed as they wish.
label: Planetary Uprising

name: Spy Net
text: After one of your dice rolls a focus ([focus]), you may exhaust this support to discard the top card of an opponent's deck.
label: Spy Net

name: Tactical Aptitude
text: After you activate attached character, you may draw a card. Then place a card form your hand on the bottom of your deck.
label: Tactical Aptitude

name: Caution
text: Remove one of your character dice to give another character 3 shields.
label: Caution

name: Destiny
text: Remove any number of your Blue dice. Play a card from your hand for free that costs equal to or less than the combined value of the Blue dice you just removed.
label: Destiny

name: Determination
text: Play only if you have one or more dice showing a focus ([focus]). Resolve one of your dice as if it was showing a different symbol (it keeps its original value)
label: Determination

name: Guard
text: Remove one of your Blue dice showing melee damage ([melee]) to remove a number of an opponent's dice equal to the value of the die you just removed.
label: Guard

name: Krayt Dragon Howl
text: Spot a Blue character to choose an opponent's die. That opponent chooses to either remove that die or discard the top 2 cards of their deck.
label: Krayt Dragon Howl

name: My Ally Is The Force
text:
Ambush.
Resolve one of your Blue dice without removing it from your pool.
label: My Ally Is The Force

name: Synchronicity
text:
Play only if you have dice showing melee damage ([melee]) and shields ([shield]).
Deal 2 unblockable damage to a character.
label: Synchronicity

name: Your Eyes Can Deceive You
text: After one of your dice rolls a shield ([shield]), you may exhaust this support to turn an opponent's die to any side.
label: Your Eyes Can Deceive You

name: Protective Mentor
text: Attached character's shields can be used to block damage dealt to any character.
label: Protective Mentor

name: Confidence
text: Choose an opponent's die and force them to resolve it, if able.
label: Confidence

name: Garbage'll Do
text: Ambush. Remove one of your vehicle dice to give each of your characters 1 shield.
label: Garbage'll Do

name: Hold On!
text:
Ambush.
Move any number of shields from one of your character to another character.
label: Hold On!

name: Rebel
text:
Play only if you have one or more dice showing a discard.
Play a card from your discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Rebel

name: Long Con
text: Gain 3 resources if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Long Con

name: Loth-Cat and Mouse
text: Force an opponent to choose and remove one of your dice. Then remove one of their dice.
label: Loth-Cat and Mouse

name: Never Tell Me The Odds
text: Choose one of your Yellow characters. Turn any number of its character and upgrade dice to sides of your choice.
label: Never Tell Me The Odds

name: Planned Explosion
text:
Play only if you have dice showing a combined value of 10 or more.
Remove all of your dice and deal 10 damage to a character.
label: Planned Explosion

name: Double-Dealing
text: After one of your dice rolls a special ([special]), you may exhaust this support to gain 1 resource.
label: Double-Dealing

name: Life Debt
text: Yellow character only. After you activate this character, you may move 1 damage from another character to this character (this ignores shields).
label: Life Debt

name: Bombing Run
text: Resolve one of your Red dice showing a disrupt ([disrupt]). Then deal 1 damage to each of an opponent's characters.
label: Bombing Run

name: Collateral Damage
text: Resolve one or more of your dice showing either melee damage ([melee]) or ranged damage ([ranged]). Then force an opponent to lose 1 resource.
label: Collateral Damage

name: Salvo
text: Resolve one of your dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]) against each of an opponent's characters.
label: Salvo

name: Suppression
text: Remove one of your Red dice showing ranged damage ([ranged]). Then remove an opponent's die.
label: Suppression

name: Aftermath
text: After a character is defeated, gain 1 resource.
label: Aftermath

name: Air Superiority
text: After you play this support, place 3 shields on it. Action - Exhaust this support to move 1 shield from it to a character.
label: Air Superiority

name: Training
text: Non-unique Red character only. Attached character is elite (place a second copy of its die on its card).
label: Training

name: Wingman
text:
Red character only.
After you activate a Red character, you may activate attached character.
label: Wingman

name: Decisive Blow
text: Resolve one of your dice showing melee damage ([melee]). Then remove all character and upgrade dice of the character you just dealt damage to.
label: Decisive Blow

name: High Ground
text:
Play only if you control the battlefield.
Remove an opponent's die showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). Then, if it was a character die, deal 1 damage to that character.
label: High Ground

name: Momentum Shift
text: Move 1 shield from an opponent's character to one of your characters.
label: Momentum Shift

name: Overconfidence
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll 2 dice. Then remove one of those dice with the lowest value (you choose in the case of a tie).
label: Overconfidence

name: Premonitions
text: Choose one: set this card aside and stack a card from your hand on it facedown, or play the card stacked on another copy of this card for free and discard the set aside copy.
label: Premonitions

name: Rejuvenate
text: Spot a Blue character to heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Rejuvenate

name: Trust Your Instincts
text: Spot a Blue character to reroll any number of its character and upgrade dice. Then you may draw a card.
label: Trust Your Instincts

name: Meditate
text: Action - Exhaust this support and remove one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to turn one of your dice to a side not showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Meditate

name: Force Illusion
text: Before attached character takes damage, you may discard cards from the top of your deck equal to that damage to block it. Then discard this upgrade from play.
label: Force Illusion

name: Evade
text: Remove a die showing ranged damage [ranged]
label: Evade

name: New Orders
text: Switch the battlefield with a battlefield that is not being used (but was brought to the game) and use its claim ability.
label: New Orders

name: Parry
text: Remove a die showing melee damage ([melee]).
label: Parry

name: Swiftness
text: Ambush. (You may take one additional action after you play this card.) Give the next card you play this turn the Ambush keyword.
label: Swiftness

name: Resolve
text: Action - Discard a card from your hand to reroll an opponent's die.
label: Resolve

name: Ammo Belt
text: Before a weapon upgrade on attached character would be discarded by a card effect, you may discard this upgrade instead.
label: Ammo Belt

name: Bolt Hole
text: Remove one of your Yellow character dice to give that character 2 shields.
label: Bolt Hole

name: Cheat
text: Switch a card in your hand with a card in your discard pile.
label: Cheat

name: Diversion
text: Force an opponent to lose 1 resource, or 3 resources instead if there is another copy of this event in your discard pile.
label: Diversion

name: "Fair" Trade
text: Resolve one of your dice showing a resource ([resource]). Then switch all of your resources with all of an opponent's resources.
label: "Fair" Trade

name: Friends in Low Places
text: Spot a Yellow character to look at an opponent's hand and discard an event from it that costs 1 or less.
label: Friends in Low Places

name: Sabotage
text: Discard cards from your hand equal to the cost of a support in play to discard that support.
label: Sabotage

name: Improvisation
text: Ambush. Action - Remove one of your dice showing a blank ([blank]) to reroll any number of your dice.
label: Improvisation

name: Outmaneuver
text: After you claim the battlefield, gain 1 resource.
label: Outmaneuver

name: Fast Hands
text:
Yellow character only.
After you activate attached character, you may resolve one of its character or upgrade dice.
label: Fast Hands

name: Carbon-freezing Chamber
subtitle: Bespin
text: Claim - Choose a character die. That die cannot be rolled during the next round.
label: Carbon-freezing Chamber - Bespin

name: Cargo Hold
subtitle: Eravana
text: Claim - Move an upgrade from a character to another character controlled by the same player.
label: Cargo Hold - Eravana

name: Docking Bay
subtitle: Finalizer
text: Claim - Play a support from your hand or discard pile, decreasing its cost by 1.
label: Docking Bay - Finalizer

name: Ewok Village
subtitle: Endor
text: Claim - Remove all shields from a character.
label: Ewok Village - Endor

name: Maz's Castle
subtitle: Takodana
text: Claim - Draw 2 cards. Place any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck (in any order).
label: Maz's Castle - Takodana

name: Moisture Farm
subtitle: Tatooine
text: Claim - Gain 1 resource.
label: Moisture Farm - Tatooine

name: Otoh Gunga
subtitle: Naboo
text: Claim - Heal 1 damage from a character.
label: Otoh Gunga - Naboo

name: Secluded Beach
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Remove an opponent's die showing ranged damage ([ranged]).
label: Secluded Beach - Scarif

name: Secret Facility
subtitle: Scarif
text: Claim - Resolve up to 3 of your dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]).
label: Secret Facility - Scarif

name: War-Torn Streets
subtitle: Jedha
text: Claim - Discard a random card from an opponent's hand.
label: War-Torn Streets - Jedha

name: Thrawn
subtitle: Master Strategist
text: After you activate this character, you may choose a number. Then look at an opponent's hand and discard a card from it that costs the chosen number.
flavor: "I study the art of war."
label: Thrawn - Master Strategist

name: K-2SO
subtitle: Reprogrammed Droid
text: The cost to play a weapon on this character is increased by 2. After you play or move a weapon onto this character for the first time each game, ready him.
flavor: "Why does she get a blaster and I don't?"
label: K-2SO - Reprogrammed Droid

name: Mace Windu
subtitle: Jedi Champion
text: Action - Remove this die to defeat a character with 2 or less remaining health.
flavor: "This party's over."
label: Mace Windu - Jedi Champion

name: Master of the Council
text:
Blue character only.
[special] - Exhaust this upgrade and spend 2 resources to ready a character.
flavor: "The council has assembled." <cite>Mace Windu</cite>
label: Master of the Council

name: Ezra Bridger
subtitle: Force-sensitive Thief
text:
You may play Blue upgrades on this character, ignoring play restrictions.
[special] - Take 1 resource from an opponent.
flavor: "Hey, a kid's gotta eat."
label: Ezra Bridger - Force-sensitive Thief

name: Sabine Wren
subtitle: Explosives Expert
text: Before you activate this character, you may play a weapon from your discard pile on her, decreasing its cost by 1 if it has the word "Thermal" in its title.
flavor: "I'll damage you if you don't shut up."
label: Sabine Wren - Explosives Expert

name: LR1K Sonic Cannon
text: Before resolving this die, you may exhaust one of your characters. If you do, you do not have to pay the resource cost on this die.
flavor: Developed by the Geonosians, the LR1K generated deadly sonic blasts.
label: LR1K Sonic Cannon

name: Prepare for War
text: Play only if this is the first action of this round (no player has taken an action). Gain 1 resource.
label: Prepare for War

name: Ruthless Tactics
text: Resolve one of your dice, increasing its value by the resource cost showing on it.
label: Ruthless Tactics

name: Quick Escape
text: Remove up to 2 dice showing damage ([ranged] or [melee]). You must pass all of your future turns this round.
label: Quick Escape

name: Thermal Paint
text: After you activate attached character, force an opponent to choose and deal 1 damage to one of their characters. Then you may discard this upgrade to deal 1 damage to that character.
label: Thermal Paint

name: Pinned Down
text: Spot a vehicle to remove a die.
label: Pinned Down

name: The Day is Ours
text: Claim the battlefield, even if an opponent has claimed it this round.
label: The Day is Ours

name: Roll On
text: Reroll one of your dice. You may reroll that die. You may reroll that die again.
flavor: "Come on, BB-8! Hurry!" <cite>Poe Dameron</cite>
